Sentencas: The reversible solid oxide cell (RSOC) is an attractive technology to mutually convert power and chemicals at elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Efficient reversible CO/CO2 conversion in solid oxide cells with a phase-transformed fuel electrode

Sentencas: However, its development has been hindered mainly due to the absence of a highly active and durable fuel electrode.
Titulo: Efficient reversible CO/CO2 conversion in solid oxide cells with a phase-transformed fuel electrode

Sentencas: Here, we report a phase-transformed CoFe-Sr3Fe1.25Mo0.75O7-delta (CoFe-SFM) fuel electrode consisting of CoFe nanoparticles and Ruddlesden-Popper-layered Sr3Fe1.25Mo0.75O7-delta (SFM) from a Sr2Fe7/6Mo0.5Co1/3O6-delta (SFMCo) perovskite oxide after annealing in hydrogen and apply it to reversible CO/CO2 conversion in RSOC.
Titulo: Efficient reversible CO/CO2 conversion in solid oxide cells with a phase-transformed fuel electrode

Sentencas: The CoFe-SFM fuel electrode shows improved catalytic activity by accelerating oxygen diffusion and surface kinetics towards the CO/CO2 conversion as demonstrated by the distribution of relaxation time (DRT) study and equivalent circuit model fitting analysis.
Titulo: Efficient reversible CO/CO2 conversion in solid oxide cells with a phase-transformed fuel electrode

Sentencas: Furthermore, an electrolyte-supported single cell is evaluated in the 2:1 CO-CO2 atmosphere at 800 degrees C, which shows a peak power density of 259 mW cm(-2) for CO oxidation and a current density of -0.453 A cm(-2) at 1.3 V for CO2 reduction, which correspond to 3.079 and 3.155 mL min(-1) cm(-2) for the CO and CO2 conversion rates, respectively.
Titulo: Efficient reversible CO/CO2 conversion in solid oxide cells with a phase-transformed fuel electrode

Sentencas: More importantly, the reversible conversion is successfully demonstrated over 20 cyclic electrolysis and fuel cell switching test modes at 1.3 and 0.6 V.
Titulo: Efficient reversible CO/CO2 conversion in solid oxide cells with a phase-transformed fuel electrode

Sentencas: This work provides a useful guideline for designing a fuel electrode through a surface/interface exsolution process for RSOC towards efficient CO-CO2 reversible conversion.
Titulo: Efficient reversible CO/CO2 conversion in solid oxide cells with a phase-transformed fuel electrode
